name: Stones and Dust
description:
Gather blue crystals one by one and place them to the portal to charge it. Once it is charged, escape !

Keyboard controls : Move with arrows, Jump with up arrow, space to attack / throw crystal.
Gamepad : Dpad to move, A to jump, X to attack / throw crystal.

Stones and Dust was made in about a day at the Kujoyama Game Jam in Kyoto. The themes were Edges and Contact. I worked a few hours more after the game jam to polish interactions, camera movement, animation and mechanics. Enjoy !
